html:
Image by The Escapist

Fire and Cable ropes are too OP!

|

Published: May 27, 2025 04:59 pm

Updated: We last updated the Rope Battles Ropes and Items tier list on May 27, 2025.

Without a good Rope, you will have a hard time facing anyone with a bit more experience in Rope Battles on Roblox. The Items can help you out immensely as well. However, with so many of them available to unlock, itâ€™s not easy to choose which ones to spend your hard-earned Coins and Diamonds on. So, to help you out with this, we prepared the following Rope Battles Ropes and Items tier list.

Table of Contents

  • Rope Battles Ropes Tier List
    • S-Tier Ropes
    • A-Tier Ropes
    • B-Tier Ropes
    • C-Tier Ropes
  • Rope Battles Items Tier List
    • S-Tier Items
    • A-Tier Items
    • B-Tier Items
  • How to Get New Ropes and Items in Rope Battles
    • How to Farm Coins and Diamonds
  • Rope Battles Ropes and Items Tier List FAQs

Rope Battles Ropes Tier List

In the Rope Battles Ropes tier list above, we ranked each Rope based on its ability, stats, and overall usefulness when fighting other players. In general, expensive Ropes have better abilities, and that is what makes them stand out from the rest. You can find the list of all Ropes in Rope Battles, along with their pros and cons, right below.

S-Tier Ropes

A-Tier Ropes

B-Tier Ropes

C-Tier Ropes

Rope Battles Items Tier List

The above Rope Battles Items tier list ranks each Item based on its damage, cooldown, AoE, and use difficulty. Even though you will use your Rope much more than Items, they can easily turn a 1v1 in your favor or let you escape from tricky situations. You can see some pros and cons of each Item in the list below.

S-Tier Items

A-Tier Items

B-Tier Items

How to Get New Ropes and Items in Rope Battles

You can unlock new Ropes and Items in Rope Battles while in the main lobby area. All Ropes are available on display at the side opposite the arena entrance, while the items can be purchased in the Items menu. Most Ropes and Items cost Coins. However, some rarer ones can be obtained using Diamonds or by spinning the gacha Wheel.

How to Farm Coins and Diamonds

There are many ways to earn Coins and Diamonds in Rope Battles. However, the most efficient methods for farming these currencies are:

  • Defeating other players
  • Completing Goals (Quests)
  • Claiming Daily login rewards
  • Spinning the gacha Wheel
  • Redeeming codes
  • Purchasing them from the Shop

That concludes our Rope Battles Ropes and Items tier list. Feel free to share what you think is the best Rope and Item combo in the comment section below. For more of our Roblox content, make sure to check out the Roblox hub here on The Escapist.

Rope Battles Ropes and Items Tier List FAQs

What are the best Ropes in Rope Battles?

The best Ropes in Rope Battles are Fire, Cable, Snow, Infection, and FishingRod.

What are the best Items in Rope Battles?

The best Items in Rope Battles are Molotov, Mine, Beer Bottle, and Spring.

Do you permanently unlock Ropes and Items when you purchase them in Rope Battles?

Yes, every Rope and Item you buy is unlocked permanently, and you can switch between them whenever you want.
